channel.title: Putting my server online
channel.description: I have a server and all, I have a no-ip account and host, I have port forwarded but now I actually have to put it online, ofcourse :P I can't make a webclient because I don't have a webhost and domain. So I guess I have to do it through it some kind of downloadable client or something?

item.title: Putting my server online
item.dc:creator: @Bitterlemon Bitterlemon
item.description:
@Bitterlemon wrote:

Ah right
But which files should I put available for download? I don’t want people looking at the passwords of other people

Read full topic

item.title: Putting my server online
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

Ok so go to client.java in your client side. search for server =
Change whatever is after the equals to “hostname.no-ip.biz”
After this is done, save + compile, put a download online for whoever wants to play it. and wala

Read full topic
